languages.text: {n}Закрыв глаза, вы пытаетесь подхватить ритмику песни, распробовать ее ретивое и своевольное течение. Увы, ваши слова не вливаются в ее поток, и стоит вам произнести их, как вы сами ощущаете их болезненную неуместность.{/n}

{n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Закрыв глаза, вы пытаетесь подхватить ритмику песни, распробовать ее ретивое и своевольное течение. Увы, ваши слова не вливаются в ее поток, и стоит вам произнести их, как вы сами ощущаете их болезненную неуместность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}你闭上眼睛，试图找到歌曲的节奏，融入这既尖锐、又古怪的律动之中。遗憾的是，你的声音无法与节奏完美地融合在一起。你才刚刚开口，就感觉到你的声音完全跟不上调子，令人难受不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你闭上眼睛，试图找到歌曲的节奏，融入这既尖锐、又古怪的律动之中。遗憾的是，你的声音无法与节奏完美地融合在一起。你才刚刚开口，就感觉到你的声音完全跟不上调子，令人难受不已。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}目を閉じて歌のリズムを拾い、鋭く独特な流れに身を任せようとしたが、虚しくも言葉が歌にうまく乗らなかった。歌い始めた瞬間に、あまりにも似つかわしくないものであることを痛感した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目を閉じて歌のリズムを拾い、鋭く独特な流れに身を任せようとしたが、虚しくも言葉が歌にうまく乗らなかった。歌い始めた瞬間に、あまりにも似つかわしくないものであることを痛感した。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Cierras los ojos e intentas acompañar el ritmo de la canción, sumirte en su singular flujo. Por desgracia, tus palabras no acompañan la corriente. En cuanto las entonas, te das cuenta de lo que has desafinado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cierras los ojos e intentas acompañar el ritmo de la canción, sumirte en su singular flujo. Por desgracia, tus palabras no acompañan la corriente. En cuanto las entonas, te das cuenta de lo que has desafinado.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Vous fermez les yeux et tentez de vous caler sur le rythme de la chanson, de vous laisser porter par sa cadence si particulière. Hélas, vos mots, plutôt que de se laisser porter par le courant, ne font que flotter en surface ; dès que vous les prononcez, vous vous rendez compte qu'ils ne sont absolument pas adaptés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous fermez les yeux et tentez de vous caler sur le rythme de la chanson, de vous laisser porter par sa cadence si particulière. Hélas, vos mots, plutôt que de se laisser porter par le courant, ne font que flotter en surface ; dès que vous les prononcez, vous vous rendez compte qu'ils ne sont absolument pas adaptés.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Du schließt die Augen und versuchst, den Rhythmus des Lieds aufzugreifen, seinen scharfen und ganz eigenen Fluss. Doch leider verschmelzen deine Worte nicht nahtlos mit dem Strom – als du sie singst, erkennst du, dass sie völlig fehl am Platze sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du schließt die Augen und versuchst, den Rhythmus des Lieds aufzugreifen, seinen scharfen und ganz eigenen Fluss. Doch leider verschmelzen deine Worte nicht nahtlos mit dem Strom – als du sie singst, erkennst du, dass sie völlig fehl am Platze sind.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kapatarak şarkının ritmine ayak uydurmaya, keskin ve kendine özgü akışına dalmaya çalışıyorsun. Ne yazık ki sözlerin, bu akışla bir türlü örtüşmüyor. Sözleri söylemeye başladığın vakit son derece yersiz olduklarını seziyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to pick up the song's rhythm, to slip into its sharp and idiosyncratic flow. Alas, your words do not seamlessly merge with the stream — as soon as you sing them, you can sense how painfully misplaced they are.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini kapatarak şarkının ritmine ayak uydurmaya, keskin ve kendine özgü akışına dalmaya çalışıyorsun. Ne yazık ki sözlerin, bu akışla bir türlü birleşemiyor. O sözleri söylemeye başladığın vakit son derece yersiz olduklarını seziyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
